summary: "Thomas & Friends" is a British TV show for kids that ran for 24 seasons from 1984 to 2021. It's about a blue steam train named Thomas and his friends on a fake railway on Sodor Island. The stories are based on books by Reverend Wilbert Awdry. In the U.S., it first aired on PBS in 1989. Now, a new animated series called "Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go" is on Cartoon Network. The show is owned by Mattel.
title: Thomas & Friends
